item.title: Blogtest
item.description: Profiling shows that the API overhead for d912pxy is up to 86% (r255,custom config) less than that of plain DirectX9. Real performance differs based on the scene and the hardware. Benchmarking results on i7-7700/GTX960: CPU-bound scenario (running Mistlock Sanctuary with custom config) @5.5k batches, all max, 1080p, v0.9.9.3a dx9 min FPS: ~6.2 max FPS: ~24.1 dx12 min FPS: ~20.9 max FPS: ~31.5 boost: min FPS: ~237% max FPS: ~30% gathered by performance data accumulation and interpolation
